content.en: HLA Algorithm Optimization: Scientists have used algorithms to answer various research questions related to human leukocyte antigen (HLA) frequencies and haplotypes in different populations. These algorithms, such as the expectation-maximization algorithm and haplotype frequency-based algorithms, have been employed to estimate frequencies, select potential donors, calculate probabilities, and optimize donor recruitment strategies. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to improve the selection of stem cell donors and increase the chances of finding suitable matches for patients in need.
content.da: HLA-algoritmeoptimering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til humane leukocytantigen (HLA) frekvenser og haplotyper i forskellige populationer. Disse algoritmer, såsom forventnings-maksimeringsalgoritmen og haplotypefrekvensbaserede algoritmer, er blevet anvendt til at estimere frekvenser, vælge potentielle donorer, beregne sandsynligheder og optimere donorrekrutteringsstrategier. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre udvælgelsen af stamcellerdonorer og øge chancerne for at finde passende matches til patienter i nød.
